meanings.definition: A garment worn on the lower part of the body, covering each leg separately
meanings.sent1: He wore his trowsers to keep his legs warm.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of trowsers for the hiking trip.
meanings.sent3: The trowsers looked like they were dancing on his legs.
meanings.sent4: Her trowsers were like two colorful snakes slithering down her legs.
meanings.sent5: The trowsers flapped in the wind as he ran, like flags on his legs.

meanings.definition: To put on or wear trowsers
meanings.sent1: He trowsers every morning before going to work.
meanings.sent2: She trowsers quickly before heading out for a walk.
meanings.sent3: They trowsers with style, like it's a fashion show.
meanings.sent4: The actor trowsers confidence like a well-tailored suit.
meanings.sent5: When she trowsers, she feels ready to take on the day.
